h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave
content: The real danger isn't the lotus itself, its what it leaves behind. Similar to that Frog Guai's ice attacks coating the area in frost, many of Kalpa-Wave's attacks (including stomps!) will leave behind large pools of blood. Stepping into any of these pools for a second will start to drain your health, so you'll need to steer clear of them at all costs!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
The real danger isn't the lotus itself, its what it leaves behind. Similar to that Frog Guai's ice attacks coating the area in frost, many of Kalpa-Wave's attacks (including stomps!) will leave behind large pools of blood. Stepping into any of these pools for a second will start to drain your health, so you'll need to steer clear of them at all costs!
